tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following cleavage patterns is characteristic of deuterostomes [doo-tuhr-oh-stohms]?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Spiral cleavage
X) Determinate cleavage
Y) Bilateral cleavage
Z) Radial cleavage
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following enzymes would be required for the formation of cDNA, a genetic transcript from eukaryotic cells that has had the introns removed?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Excinuclease [ex-ih-noo-clee-ayse]
X) AP Endonuclease
Y) Reverse transcriptase
Z) DNase I
